articles.author: Yeo Boon Ping
articles.title: CNBC Daily Open: Surprise tariff salvo on Saturday - CNBC
articles.description: It's anyone's guess why U.S. President Donald Trump posted tariff letters to the European Union and Mexico — 30% on goods imported from both — on Saturday.
articles.content:
No one likes working over the weekend.
Unless you are the leader of the free world firing off social media posts that is, after all, what counts as work for many politicians nowadays announcing barr… [+3476 chars]
